name: Insight cards
description:
Use these flexible and easy-to-edit insight cards to summarise your research findings and communicate the core ideas quickly. 

This is great if you want to quickly present your suggestions to a client / development team or if you just want to keep everything in one place.  

The examples and components should provide you with a jumping off point to building your own style of insight cards. Add your own colours, fonts and flare :)
